reviews.customers_say: Customers love this dress for its professional yet sexy look, with one mentioning its gorgeous straps. The dress features a thick fabric that's not too thin or too thick, and customers appreciate how it hugs their curves perfectly. They find it comfortable and super stretchy, with one noting it's particularly suitable for curvy girls. While some it's true to size, others find it runs small. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I loved this dress.
items.body: I purchased this dress to wear to a wedding. It is a true "bandage dress". The material is thick, no lining is needed. Great quality, especially for the price. The dress is not see through. Very easy to put on. The straps stayed in place and very functional. Very easy to wear. This dress hugged in all the right places will holding in what needed to be held in! Very form fitting! Read more
items.author: DianeT

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality, exceeded expectations, felt beautiful in it! Buying another in black!
items.body: Pretty color, quality fabric, I felt sooo sexy in this dress!!! The fabric is breathable and stretchy. The dress looks more expensive than it it, in my opinion. True to size. My 38DDDs were a bit large for the top, as you can see. But I made it work! Im going to buy it again in black! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars True size
items.body: Love the quality of the dress the fit is great it‚Äôs hugs your curves great. Read more
items.author: martha aguilar

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stunning Dress made for curves but... already worn
items.body: So I'm 5 foot even and 195lbs. I have wide hips, a generous butt and thick thighs, and I got a large and it fits like a fricken glove. So anyone built similarly this dress is made for us. The dress itself is curvy with a wider hip area. It hugs your curves and the material is so thick it smooths out rolls and flattens the tummy. I love this dress, my new 'little black dress.' The ONLY reason I gave it four stars is because when I got it there were deodorant stains on it. Now I loved the dress so much I just washed it, no big deal the stains came out. I know this could be a deal breaker for other though. Read more
items.author: Lakisha

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable
items.body: This dress is awesome!! It hugs comfortably and is Classy, sexy, and feminine!! I wear a size L size 13-14 for a reference . If you need a very nice quality‚Äôs dress‚Ä¶ this is the one! I loved it‚Ä¶ Read more
items.author: Vanessa Hayes

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted üåπ
items.body: Fits perfect!! I highly recommend. I am 5'1 135 pounds and wear a 6/M. Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but uncomfortable
items.body: Very pretty and good quality dress, but the embellishment under the arms was hurting on the inside of my arm. Read more
items.author: Koko

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Drbdy420-white, Drbd132-lilac, Drbd197-royal, Drbdy420-black, Drbd71794-white, Drbd1029106-red, Drbd70709-white, Drbd132-royal, Drbd132-wine, Drbdh243-red, Drbdy420-red, Drbd70709-black, Drbd70709-blush, Drbd1029106-royal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
